BNC User Reference Guide

<defaultVal>

defaultVal specifies the default declared value for an attribute.
Declaration 
element defaultVal { text }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <defaultVal
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"
xmlns:tei="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">#IMPLIED</defaultVal>
Note

any legal declared value or TEI-defined keyword
Module tagdocs
